clothes.description: A soft, textured sweater designed with a V-neck, icon at left chest and ribbed trim, Slim Fit, Imported

Suit blazer with pointed lapel collar. Features front flap pockets with satin piping, a besom pocket at the chest and lining with an inside pocket. Vent in the back. Buttoned cuffs and buttoned front.
Checked, cropped chino trousers with contrasting side stripes. They feature two side pockets, two rear welt pockets, one coin pocket and belt loops. Zip fly and top button fastening.
